thread.title: IMAX China Makes It Big With Hong Kong Listing
thread.title_full: IMAX China Makes It Big With Hong Kong Listing - WSJ

author: Yvonne Lee
title: IMAX China Makes It Big With Hong Kong Listing
text:
HONG KONG—Hollywood made a splash Thursday with the debut of IMAX Corp.’s China division on the Hong Kong stock exchange.
Shares of IMAX China Holding Inc. surged 10% as investors bought into the prospects for booming box-office receipts on the Chinese mainland, the world’s second-largest market for movies after the U.S.
